thread.section_title: Hotel Le M - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb hotel and value
thread.title_full: Superb hotel and value - Review of Hotel Le M, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Alan F
title: Superb hotel and value
text:
My wife and I stayed at this hotel for one night last week. WE chose it because we were going to the theatre near Montmartre and wanted a hotel within waliking distance. The hotel has been refurbished and, most important of all, the room size was very comfortable. In paris there are so many hotel in which the rooms are tiny and therefore uncomfortable. We had a large double bed, and a big bathroom. The cupboard was spacious enough for us.
We ate breakfast at the hotel and there was a well furnished buffet. The staff was very helpful. We paid 170 euros plus &รง euros per person for the breakfast. In our eyes it was very good value for money.
If you want to eat at an excellent restaurant in the area, go to La Cerisaie at 70 Boulevard Edgar Quinet. It is les than 5 minutes walk from the hotel. It serves south-west France cuisine and is delicious. It is a very small restaurant and so you have to book a table.
